call_summary: ADA Policy Violation - Agent apologized after ADA disclosure

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Justin. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I need help with my credit card payment.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I have a speech disability, please be patient with me

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm sorry to hear that. Let me transfer you to our special services.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I need to speak to a supervisor.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'll make a note of your concern.
